name: Mind's Eye: Secrets of the Forgotten
description: Follow an enterprising journalist who smells murderous intent behind what everyone assumes was a suicide.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB 3D video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 3 GHZ processor or better Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB 3D video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
